summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5540 for the improvement of 32nd Avenue South (East Side), from Brandon Street to Dawson Street, and from a point approximately 270 feet south of Hudson Street to Hudson Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 71282, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
